alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 8:53PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY WET SNOW WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL STILLWATER...CENTRAL CARBON AND SOUTHWESTERN YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES... At 849 PM MDT, a band of heavy wet snow was located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Billings Heights to 6 miles southwest of Laurel to near Red Lodge. Movement was east at 5 mph. Visibility under a mile is possible along with slushy snow accumulations of an inch or less. Locations impacted include... Billings, Red Lodge, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Bearcreek, Edgar, Belfry, Boyd, Roberts, Molt, Fox, Silesia, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Acton, Park City and Rockvale. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
